https://github.com/psf/black## Features- Uses Tensorflow to emulate the following summary statistics: 21-cm power spectrum, 21-cm global brightness temperature, IGM spin temperature, and neutral fraction.- Uses 21cmFAST to analytically calculate the UV luminosity functions and the Thomson optical depth to the CMB.## Requirements- Tensorflow >= 2.6- 21cmFAST## InstallationYou can install _py21cmEMU_ via [pip] from [PyPI]:```console$ pip install py21cmemu```Note that you need `gcc` and the `fftw3` and `gsl` packages for the `21cmFAST` installation.## UsagePlease see the [Command-line
